about_the_game:
Bonle is a casual puzzle solving game designed to help people learn about skeletal anatomy and solve fun puzzles doing it! You can choose from a Human skeleton, a T. Rex skeleton, or a Cat skeleton, and your goal is to guess the target bone that's been selected at random. When you make a guess, the bone will change color to show how close you are to the right answer.

No Prior Knowledge Needed!

Shown below is an example of the bone index, a library that tells you the simplified name for the bone and what you should type. As the difficulty increases, the bones become less and less simplified!

Full Release

Only the first 3 skeletons available in the full release(T. Rex, Cat, and Human) will be available in this demo. The full release will include 9+ skeletons, save/leaderboard systems with player statistics, level progression, cosmetics for your skeletons, and much more!
detailed_description:
Bonle is a casual puzzle solving game designed to help people learn about skeletal anatomy and solve fun puzzles doing it! You can choose from a Human skeleton, a T. Rex skeleton, or a Cat skeleton, and your goal is to guess the target bone that's been selected at random. When you make a guess, the bone will change color to show how close you are to the right answer.

No Prior Knowledge Needed!

Shown below is an example of the bone index, a library that tells you the simplified name for the bone and what you should type. As the difficulty increases, the bones become less and less simplified!

Full Release

Only the first 3 skeletons available in the full release(T. Rex, Cat, and Human) will be available in this demo. The full release will include 9+ skeletons, save/leaderboard systems with player statistics, level progression, cosmetics for your skeletons, and much more!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Quad core 2.3GHz x86-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 Ti or ATI Radeon™ HD 7850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Quad core 3.2GHz x86-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti or ATI Radeon™ RX560
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: BONLE Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Quad core 2.3GHz x86-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 Ti or ATI Radeon™ HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad core 3.2GHz x86-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti or ATI Radeon™ RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Bonle is a casual puzzle solving game designed to help people learn about skeletal anatomy and solve fun puzzles doing it! This demo showcases the main gameplay as well as the some of our upcoming features. All features listed and more will be implemented in the full release.
